Items.Text: Status bar with app version and current time
Auto-sync of changelog.json from install folder to user profile
Layout of Single-player / Multi-player tabs (proper Dock/Anchor behavior)
“Mods” group: listbox now fills the frame correctly
DataGridViewComboBoxCell value is not valid when adding a new row
Content no longer overlaps with the status bar on various DPIs
Initial setup with all CORE features
client path fix (Steam) - solution for Steam versions
Adjusting App version for auto updater
Production version is now visible in footer of application
Updater shows a progress dialog during download and extraction.
Updater now preserves user configuration files (configs.json, sp_configs.json, filters_global.json, config.json); only changelog.json from the release is overwritten.
Changelog editor supports time selection (DateTime); dates are stored as 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'.
